title: PLEASE bring Normal Draft pick back to OCE!
body:
Title says it all really, a lot of people are screaming out of this and I believe he server has more than grown enough for it to accommodate another playlist!

Discuss, people :)

replies.body: Having normal draft just replace regular normals would be fine.
They said they would like to rework Normals into a mixture of Draft and Blind pick. So that's something to look forward to if you don't like the current Normal queue.

I think draft pick is better than blind pick for a few reasons including avoiding the rush to spam MID or w.e role people want and then having people argue over who was first and then deciding that talon sup is fine as they cant play it mid this game. Also avoiding mirror matches which I personally hate. Get rid of blind rush to call lane and give us unranked draft.
They've just begun removing norm draft from other regions what gives you the idea that we will get it...
As much as I'd love it, it's not gonna happen. Especially now that Riot's talking about taking normal draft from other regions

LOL Riot are talking about maybe not giving us Flex and Solo/Duo ranked permanently and the possibility of having Flex only on at certain times, and you want normal drafts.

I personally will be using Flex basically as Draft Normals for the most part.
